message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $12,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price point, considering its potential benefits for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
